title: Ticket #3002: GROUP_SORT_EXPR is undocumented
description: Dan and I noticed that GROUP_SORT_EXPR is undocumented (only reference I found was to #2885. Could this be documented please?
remarks:
2012-Jul-05 13:10:59 by smoler:
Looks like this omission was fixed for the 7.8.1 release. Resolving this ticket, since the problem was previously fixed.
